channel.title: Elo My Melo | Technology and Education
channel.description: From my passion and love for technology, I built this website to share my opinion with the world. My website is unique and special in its own way. You will get a clean, refined and modern user experience while visiting this website. Articles and reviews represent my research data and honest thoughts about the topics, which hold high standards in my opinion. Don't forget to comment using the comment section ...

item.title: Top 5 features of the new JBL Flip 7 bluetooth speaker
item.description: Discover the JBL Flip 7 with its high-quality build, Pushlock accessory system, detachable wrist strap, and dedicated Auracast button. Explore its IP68 water and dust resistance, powerful sound with a woofer and tweeter, and the new 7-band EQ for a customized audio experience. Available in 6 stunning colors! ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: 'The New JBL Charge 6' 10 must-know features before buying
item.description: Discover the top 10 features of the new JBL Charge 6, including its detachable carrying handle, bold JBL logo, Type-C charging with power bank support, improved stability, IP68 waterproof rating, and enhanced 7-band EQ ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: 10 things you must know about the class-leading Soundcore Motion+ portable bluetooth speaker
item.description: Motion Plus is a champion in its size category by delivering great bass response and exceptional mids and highs. It is very impressive that motion+ has 4 active drivers and 2 passive radiators. We are talkinglike 6 drivers in that small package. It means that soundcore did put a lot of effort while designing this speaker ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Samsung AKG Type-C Earphones review | needed to tweak with EQ
item.description: The design and build is pretty good in my opinion. The default sound signature is a little too bright for my taste, it can cause irritation when listening to some particularly bright songs that have high-frequency instruments. So, if you are going to use the default sound signature and you also like a bit of powerful bass, then I am not recommending these earphones to you. However, if you are an audio-enthusiast or tech-savvy, then these earphones are gonna be a great choice for you ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Boom 2 Plus vs Tribit Stormbox Blast vs JBL Boombox 3
item.description: JBL Boombox 3 for low, Tribit Stormbox Blast for above average and Boom 2 Plus for outdoors or maximum volume listening. Boom 2 Plus is muddy, less accurate and missing the deep bass. Boombox 3 and Stormbox Blast offer pretty deep bass down to 40 Hz. Boombox 3 has 700 Hz issue and Stormbox Blast has 5.5 KHz dipping issue. The JBL Boombox 3 also limits its bass after 80% volume. Overall, the Tribit Stirmbox Blast is the champion. Boom 2 Plus shines in cool, bold and sexy design ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Boom 2 just crashed the JBL Xtreme 4
item.description: The Xtreme 4 has a much better battery, but doesn’t have the powerful sound and fancy LED lights of Boom 2 speaker. To be honest, the beat-synced lights on the passive rads of Boom 2 look super attractive, they’re pretty bright too. The Xtreme 4 offers a premium design and build compared to the Boom 2 speaker. However, JBL Xtreme 4’s 330 USD price tag vs Soundcore Boom 2’s 130 USD makes the Boom 2 a no-brainer ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Boom 2 vs Motion X600 speaker | pick wisely
item.description: Boom 2 offers a very powerful sound with a huge boost in the bass and highs, making it a very good outdoor speaker. The Motion X600 also has bass and treble boost but it’s significantly less powerful. However, it sounds noticeably more open and detailed, good for critical indoor listening. They serve different purposes for different scenarios ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Boom 2 holds its ground against Motion Boom Plus
item.description: New Boom 2 packs the same 80 watts of power as the Motion Boom Plus but in a much smaller body. The single racetrack woofer produces massive power to hang out with the big boys. However, Boom 2’s new configuration cannot produce good stereo imaging. At maximum volume, they are both neck and neck in loudness ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Boom 2 vs Motion Boom | massive boom
item.description: The Boom 2 can sound very bass-heavy at lower volumes. But the boosted bass helps at higher vol­umes. The power is massive over the old Motion Boom. New Boom 2 is signi­ficantly louder, like 3 LUFS gain in loudness at maximum volume. Also, BassUp increases the bass a lot and makes the sound much louder, even at max volume ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: JBL Xtreme 4 isn't worth upgrading from Xtreme 3
item.description: Xtreme 4's 68 Wh battery is the biggest upgrade vs smaller 36 Wh on the X3. Xtreme 3 sounds fuller with more upper bass at lower volumes, but the Xtreme 4 starts to sound fuller at higher volumes. At max volume, the X4 is around 1.5 dB louder on average loudness measurement. This is not a big difference but the X4 is a bit better and less screamy for moderate to higher level listening. I think you should not upgrade ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Realme 10 review | best budget phone even in 2024
item.description: Overall, a very good budget phone that has an amazing snappy user experience. I got sold by the smoothness and optimization. Also, the night mode was producing some amazing shots with quick pro­cessing. From an overall point of view, it’s one of the best budget phones - even now ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Motion Boom vs X500 and X600 | champ boom
item.description: My opinion, if you want a speaker for ana­lytical and critical listening, go for the more expen­sive X600. Want a warmer sound with premium build, take the X500. If you want a pound-for-pound champion, Motion Boom is a clear winner. I love the accuracy of the Boom, pretty flat frequency response. There is another option for analytical listening, which is way cheaper than X600 - the Motion+ ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Motion X500 vs X600 | huge difference
item.description: The X600 clearly wins in configuration, but the sound quality is subjective. Better spatial effects on the X600 but better bass with less distortion on the X500. Both have premium build quality and good design ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Motion 300 vs Bose SoundLink Flex - overpriced Flex
item.description: Motion 300 has decent bass but becomes bass-light and way louder than Flex at higher volumes. Bose holds onto its bass by the cost of loudness. This makes the Bose more pleasant to listen to at higher volumes. Motion 300 pushes the mids and highs to go louder ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: How to use Mutation Observer & data-ad-status attribute to hide unfilled ad units
item.description: Use javascript mutation observer to detect data-ad-status=unfilled and hide unfilled Google AdSense ad units. Observe any attribute or parameter change then customize filled or unfilled ad units. Show ad blocker message when the script is blocked. It will make your website more polished and refined with better user experience.
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: How to link Payoneer account with PayPal
item.description: Step by step guide to transfer money from PayPal to Payoneer by linking your Payoneer global receiving bank account to any PayPal account. Maybe your country doesn’t support PayPal or you have both but you want to send money from PayPal to Payoneer, then this article will make your work much easier. This will also help you while working with international clients like freelancing, doing remote work and so on.
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Soundcore Liberty 4 earbuds don't sound mature enough
item.description: Anker Soundcore Liberty 4 earbuds offer a v-shaped sound signature. They have crazy features like spatial audio and heart rate monitoring. But the sound signature is subjective as it has bass-heavy and treble-heavy v-shaped frequency response by default, which is the soundcore signature sound. The build and design is amazing though
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Apple iPhone 14 series with 2 separate display cutouts
item.description: The new Apple iPhone 14 series is making a big gap between the Pro and non-Pro models. Only the Pro versions are getting A16 Bionic chip with much better cameras. The new iOS 16 is coming with them.
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Nothing Phone 1 is here to make a change
item.description: The design and aesthetics are the main attraction of this phone because it’s nothing like any other phone on the market right now. Nothing Phone 1 takes the transparency onto another level. The crazy part is there are LED strips around the wireless charging coil. I hope they will release a black transparent version of the same phone which will look subtle, classic and gorgeous
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Nillkin Super Frosted Shield Matte case review
item.description: Nillkin Super Frosted Shield Matte case has simple and minimal look which is very nice and clean that a lot of people prefer over flashy and bulky look. I am a fan of this type of thin and light classic looking case. It's not built for ultimate drop protection but can provide some decent protection from small drops ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: OnePlus Nord review - balance is the key
item.description: OnePlus Nord isn't a true flagship but it is a true all-rounder that is very efficient with its SD765G processor and performs really well till now no matter what application you run on the device. It has a glass and plastic build with a capable camera system that you can modify with the google camera mod for a significant bump up in image quality ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: JBL Flip 6 offers meaningful upgrade - close to charge 4
item.description: The new JBL Flip 6 having an additional 10 watt tweeter, sounds more fizzy and airy which is way better than Flip 5 but actually close to charge 4 and charge 5. It's quite harsh and bass light at higher volumes. It cannot win over soundcore motion+ in terms of sound quality despite having premium build and design. The price is just okay but not exceptional value for money. Overall the Flip 6 offers great bass at average volume which is kinda special and I recommend flip 6 for ultimate portability, bass response, build and design ...
item.dc:creator: elomymelo.com

item.title: Anker Soundcore Motion Plus speaker detailed review
item.description: Soundcore Motion+ has an excellent design and build that can really help with the sound dispersion and nice stereo separation. I have played with the eq bands quite a lot and they are real eq. Motion+ is a champion in its size category by delivering great bass response and exceptional mids and highs ...
